note:
Engineer, PhD. Electoral reform advocate, including for my home province of Alberta.
He/him.

Profile pic: From the old railway bike trail in Algonquin. Bicycle leaning against the railing next to a pond, surrounded by greenery.
Banner pic: From Skyline in Cape Breton, NS. View from up high looking down at the calm expansive datk blue ocean, with the sun shining an elongated golden reflection in the water. Clear, light blue sky.
